content.value: public ValueTask<RunSummary> Run(IXunitTestCollection testCollection, IReadOnlyCollection<IXunitTestCase> testCases, ExplicitOption explicitOption, IMessageBus messageBus, ITestCaseOrderer testCaseOrderer, ExceptionAggregator aggregator, CancellationTokenSource cancellationTokenSource, FixtureMappingManager assemblyFixtureMappings)

Public Function Run(testCollection As IXunitTestCollection, testCases As IReadOnlyCollection(Of IXunitTestCase), explicitOption As ExplicitOption, messageBus As IMessageBus, testCaseOrderer As ITestCaseOrderer, aggregator As ExceptionAggregator, cancellationTokenSource As CancellationTokenSource, assemblyFixtureMappings As FixtureMappingManager) As ValueTask(Of RunSummary)

parameters.description: The test collection to be run.
The test cases to be run. Cannot be empty.
A flag to indicate how explicit tests should be treated.
The message bus to report run status to.
The test case orderer that was applied at the assembly level.
The exception aggregator used to run code and collection exceptions.
The task cancellation token source, used to cancel the test run.
The mapping manager for assembly fixtures.

The test class to be run. May be null for test cases that do not support classes and methods.

return.description: Returns summary information about the tests that were run.
